chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION;
chapter.para: SCCP provides connectionless and connection-oriented network services and global title translation (GTT) capabilities above MTP Level 3. SCCP provides also extended routing, flow control, segmentation and reassembly of data service.

A global title is an address (e.g., a dialed 800 number, calling card number, or mobile subscriber identification number) which is translated by SCCP into a destination point code and subsystem number. A subsystem number uniquely identifies an application at the destination signaling point. SCCP is used as the transport layer for TCAP -based services

As its main purpose is to route data units between signaling nodes, it requires means of configuring routing directives. This CLI provides way to easly manage routing information in &THIS.PLATFORM; SCCP implementation.
